tha-ap538:7.4: cariyaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ → pasannanayanānanaṃ (bj) | pinasampannavekkhaṇaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pīṇaṃsaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap538:18.3: Suppārapaṭṭanavaraṃ → suppārakaṃ paṭṭanavaraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | suppārapaṭṭanam varaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | suppādapaṭṭanavaraṃ (csp1ed)
tha-ap538:26.2: Sadā jinaṃ passāmi vimalānanaṃ → parājinaṃ passāmi kamalānanaṃ (mr)
tha-ap538:29.2: pācayantaṃ pītākaraṃ → bhājayantaṃ viyāmataṃ (bj) | jotayantaṃ idhāmataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhājayantaṃ idāmataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap538:40.3: Gatāyuṃ sukkhakilesaṃ → gatāyusaṃ gataklesaṃ (bj) | gatāyusaṃ gataklesañ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | tadāyu saṅkatālesaṃ (mr)
